scenes.name: The Town Hall Meeting
scenes.description: Residents gather to discuss Tom Clark's proposal for revitalizing Sunset Valley.
keypoints: Community debate on the future direction of Sunset Valley
outcomes: Agreement on some projects, disagreement on others

scenes.name: Library Afternoons
scenes.description: Tom visits the library to research and plan his proposals with help from Mrs. Johnson.
outcomes: Gathering of historical data and inspiration

scenes.name: Main Street Revival Discussion
scenes.description: Tom meets with shop owners and residents to gauge support for his plans.
keypoints: Building a coalition for community improvement

scenes.name: Old Factory Visit
scenes.description: Tom explores the abandoned factory, envisioning its potential transformation.
outcomes: Motivation to propose conversion into community center

scenes.name: Fourth of July Parade Planning Meeting
scenes.description: Community leaders meet to plan the parade, highlighting the town's resilience.
keypoints: Discussion on parade themes emphasizing community spirit
Unity in celebration despite economic struggles

scenes.name: Library Conflict Resolution Session
scenes.description: Tom and Mayor Thompson discuss their differing visions for Sunset Valley's future.
